sense.gloss: protrusion or depression in the middle of an object
center, centre, most important part, main point

sdata.j: ↑出版↑↓しゅっぱん↓↑社↑↓しゃ↓|へそ|の↑本↑↓ほん↓↑１↑↓いっ↓↑冊↑↓さつ↓↑注文↑↓ちゅうもん↓してくれませんか。
sdata.e: Will you please order a copy of the book from the publisher?

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑駅↑↓えき↓|へ↑祖父↑↓そ|ふ↓を↑見送↑↓みおく↓りに↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: He went to see his grandfather off at the station.

sdata.j: ↑創造↑↓そうぞう↓↑論↑↓ろん↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には、アダムとイブに|へそ|はなくエデンの↑園↑↓その↓の↑木↑↓き↓には↑年輪↑↓ねんりん↓がなかったと↑信↑↓しん↓じる↑人↑↓ひと↓もいる。
sdata.e: Some creationists believe that Adam and Eve had no navels, and that the trees in the Garden of Eden had no growth rings.
